affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "alarm" );
	use ( "alarm_icon" );
	use ( "dead_plat01" );
	use ( "dead_plat02" );
	use ( "go2train" );
	set ( "SET_RESET_ALL_VIEWDIST", 1000.000 );
}


affect ( "plat_guy", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
}
